profile.shortBio: Software Engineer specializing in blockchain development, AI systems, and secure applications. Currently pursuing BTech in Computer Science at JIIT.
profile.longBio: Passionate software engineer with expertise in blockchain development, machine learning, and full-stack applications. Selected for both Google Summer of Code (OWASP Foundation) and Summer of Bitcoin (Unchained Capital) in 2025. Winner of Smart India Hackathon 2024 with 300,000+ participating teams. Active open-source contributor with 50+ merged PRs across various projects and maintainer of 50+ GitHub repositories.
